questions.question: Both the ALU and control unit of CPU employ special purpose storage which is called
The number of levels in the design of a 64 X 1 mux using 4 X 1 mux
On which factor the number of functions realized by a decoder depends?
One mux can realize one function at a time and the functional dependency can be preseved in multilevel realizations

answers.a: Can not occur when a positive value is added to a negative value
answers.b: Is flagged whenever there is carry from sign bit addition
answers.c: Is flagged when the carry from sign bit and previous bit matches
